Program_Info.Program_OS_Support: WinXP,Win7 x32,Win7 x64,Win8 x32,Win8 x64,Win10 x32,Win10 x64,Win11 x32,Win11 x64,Win12 x32,Win12 x64,Win Other
Program_Info.Program_Change_Info: Updated and enhanced the PC Mac Dock for better user experience. Update and fixed a few bugs I found in the Wave Player media application.
Program_Info.Program_System_Requirements: 1024 x 768 Display Size | Windows XP and Beyond...

English.Keywords: alternative, office, software, suite, freeware, free, productivity, word, processor, spreadsheet, network, communications, voip, lan, rtf, text, editor, photo, scanner
English.Char_Desc_45: A free premium productivity office suite.
English.Char_Desc_80: A free premium productivity office suite for all Windows WIN32 systems.
English.Char_Desc_250: This office suite introduces some new innovative concepts in interface design and user-friendly application interaction. You get instant system access, top class application design and a cleaner desktop to name a few.
English.Char_Desc_450: This is not your run-of-the-mill office suite, it's a productivity and user-experience upgrade! This office suite introduces some new innovative concepts in interface design and user-friendly application interaction. You get instant system access, top class application design and a cleaner desktop to name a few. With its full 32-bit architecture and stability, it can improve your productivity and document format compatibility.
English.Char_Desc_2000:
This is not your run-of-the-mill office suite, it's a productivity and user-experience upgrade! This office suite introduces some new innovative concepts in interface design and user-friendly application interaction. You get instant system access, top class application design and a cleaner desktop to name a few. With its full 32-bit architecture and stability, it can improve your productivity and document format compatibility.
The graphical-user-interface has been made into a more iconic-toolbar, mouse centrist type of interface. This increases user-interaction speed and user productivity. This office suite was created to be as useful as possible to whoever needed a free office suite. So... if you enjoy a more uncluttered desktop, cleaner looking application interfaces, and faster software interaction, then this office suite is for You!
Create a cleaner desktop with enhanced performance and advanced application interfaces.
Installation Instructions:
- Before running any software applications, please read the "Read Me" document first! - Make sure you have default printer selected on your system, any printer selection will work.
Features in SSuite Excalibur Release:
- PC Desktop Dock - Thumbnail Previews - Network File Transfers - Custom Template Library - Multi-Display compatible - Tabbed document interfaces - Direct access to cloud storage services e.g. OneDrive, Dropbox - Create WordArt and Math Equations / Expressions in WordGraph - Export your documents to PDF, PNG, GIF, JPG, BMP, EMF, TIFF and SSP - Create presentations in WordGraph - (Viewable in any web browser and EZPhoto album viewer)
.
New Online Edition Available: https://desktop.ssuiteoffice.com/ .
No Java or DotNet required, Green Energy Software. Saving the planet one bit at a time... :D
